changeSet.author: Christopher Tubbs
changeSet.createView: SELECT VF.feature_id, VF.variable_id, TS.initialization_date AS basis_time, TS.initialization_date + INTERVAL '1 MINUTE' * TSV.lead AS valid_time, TSV.lead, TSV.series_value, TS.ensemble_id, TS.measurementunit_id, TS.timeseries_id FROM wres.TimeSeries TS INNER JOIN wres.TimeSeriesValue TSV ON TSV.timeseries_id = TS.timeseries_id INNER JOIN wres.VariableFeature VF ON VF.variablefeature_id = TS.variablefeature_id;
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE wres.Forecasts OWNER TO wres;
changeSet.comment: The wres.Forecasts view has been updated.
